title: Haman’s Plot to Destroy the Jews
summary: Haman is promoted by the king and becomes enraged when Mordecai won’t bow to him. He convinces the king to issue a decree to destroy all the Jews in the empire, casting lots (pur) to choose the date.

faq.question: Why did Haman want to destroy the Jews?
faq.answer: Because Mordecai refused to bow to him, and Haman’s pride led to hatred of all Jews.

faq.question: What was the king’s response?
faq.answer: He gave Haman his signet ring and authority to carry out the decree.
